title: Applications
noApps: You don't have any applications yet

create.title: Create Application
create.responsibility: You will be assigned as the owner of the application and will take responsibility for actions performed with your application. Your application must be approved before users can authorize.

view.title: Application Details
view.clientSecretOnce: You will only see the client secret once.
view.messageInfo: Displayed to users when they authorize to this application.
view.approvalInfo: Your application must be approved before users other than you can authorize.
view.approvalTerms: You must add a link to your terms of service before requesting approval.
view.approvalPrivacy: You must add a link to your privacy policy before requesting approval.
view.approvalMessage: You must add an authorization message before requesting approval.
view.scopesInfo: You will only be able to request these scopes when authorizing.
view.changes: Your changes are not saved yet.
view.changesApproved: Changes require re-approval for your app.
view.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this application?
view.accessControlDescription: Limit access to this application to specific users.
